QuestData.Title: This Way Out
QuestData.Description:
We are fully prepared to launch the necropolis. We must hurry before Margrave Gharmal tries to interfere.
Speak with Vyn when you are prepared, but we mustn't waste time.
We will cast our shadow upon all of Maldraxxus.
QuestData.LogDescription: Tell Whisperer Vyn to launch the necropolis.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Tell Whisperer Vyn to launch the necropolis.
